data.text:
Reached my 5 PM quota. Continuing to the next training 
after a 10-minute break.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Reached my 5 PM quota. Continuing to the next training 
<story>after a 10-minute break.

data.text: E-Excuse me... Are you Mihono Bourbon?
data.name: Honest Horsegirl
data.processed: <story>E-Excuse me... Are you Mihono Bourbon?

data.text:
It was a normal day of training when a lone horse girl 
galloped up to Mihono Bourbon.
data.processed:
<story>It was a normal day of training when a lone horse girl 
<story>galloped up to Mihono Bourbon.

data.text:
I'm sorry for interrupting... I know you're 
always doing such tough trainings, so...
data.name: Honest Horsegirl
data.processed:
<story>I'm sorry for interrupting... I know you're 
<story>always doing such tough trainings, so...

data.text:
Worry not. I'm open to 'conversation.' 
What did you want to discuss?
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Worry not. I'm open to 'conversation.' 
<story>What did you want to discuss?

data.text:
Umm, so... You used to do short races, right? 
I'm just impressed that you managed to do so well 
in a medium distance race!
data.name: Honest Horsegirl
data.processed:
<story>Umm, so... You used to do short races, right? 
<story>I'm just impressed that you managed to do so well 
<story>in a medium distance race!

data.text:
That girl looks quite excited. Mihono Bourbon on the 
other hand is staring at her motionlessly.
data.processed:
<story>That girl looks quite excited. Mihono Bourbon on the 
<story>other hand is staring at her motionlessly.

data.text: What is it you're trying to achieve by telling me that?
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>What is it you're trying to achieve by telling me that?

data.text: Huh?
data.name: Honest Horsegirl
data.processed: <story>Huh?

data.text:
I concluded that you must have some sort of reason 
to reach out to me during my break.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>I concluded that you must have some sort of reason 
<story>to reach out to me during my break.

data.text:
A question, inspection, confirmation, et cetera. 
What would be the reason for you reaching out to me?
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>A question, inspection, confirmation, et cetera. 
<story>What would be the reason for you reaching out to me?

data.text: R-Reason...?
data.name: Honest Horsegirl
data.processed: <story>R-Reason...?

data.text:
As the girl was thinking over Mihono Bourbon's 
question, her face turned a little red.
data.processed:
<story>As the girl was thinking over Mihono Bourbon's 
<story>question, her face turned a little red.

data.text:
Sorry, I didn't have a particular reason, 
I just wanted to chat for a bit... 
I guess I interrupted you after all, so I'll be going!
data.name: Honest Horsegirl
data.processed:
<story>Sorry, I didn't have a particular reason, 
<story>I just wanted to chat for a bit... 
<story>I guess I interrupted you after all, so I'll be going!

data.text: That's not what I...
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>That's not what I...

data.text:
The girl trots away. Mihono Bourbon's only movement 
comes from her eyes as they follow after the girl.
data.processed:
<story>The girl trots away. Mihono Bourbon's only movement 
<story>comes from her eyes as they follow after the girl.

data.text:
I am currently analyzing for possible counter- 
measures for my inability to reach my target 
parameters, a.k.a. 'failure.'
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>I am currently analyzing for possible counter- 
<story>measures for my inability to reach my target 
<story>parameters, a.k.a. 'failure.'

data.text:
Parameters like expression and tone of voice, 
taken from my data log that are useful for 
achieving 'proper communication.'
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Parameters like expression and tone of voice, 
<story>taken from my data log that are useful for 
<story>achieving 'proper communication.'

data.text:
At least she's self-aware... So she wants to get 
better at socializing and having conversations...
data.processed:
<story>At least she's self-aware... So she wants to get 
<story>better at socializing and having conversations...

data.text: My parents ordered me to improve my social skills.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>My parents ordered me to improve my social skills.

data.text:
I spent my childhood training with my father, so I never 
interacted with other horse girls of my age.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>I spent my childhood training with my father, so I never 
<story>interacted with other horse girls of my age.

data.text:
Thus, my parents grew worried about my social skills 
when it became clear I was going to Tracen Academy.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Thus, my parents grew worried about my social skills 
<story>when it became clear I was going to Tracen Academy.

data.text:
They told me to take great care to interact 
with my classmates and make friends.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>They told me to take great care to interact 
<story>with my classmates and make friends.

data.text:
They are right. Good social skills are a necessity for 
horse girls. We need it for interviews and 
interacting with fans.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>They are right. Good social skills are a necessity for 
<story>horse girls. We need it for interviews and 
<story>interacting with fans.

data.text:
In order to fulfill my parents' order, I created new 
parameters. I have set my objective to actively 
start conversations.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>In order to fulfill my parents' order, I created new 
<story>parameters. I have set my objective to actively 
<story>start conversations.

data.text:
However, the parameters have decreased slightly since 
school started. Extrapolating the data, it would seem 
impossible to fulfill my objective at this rate.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>However, the parameters have decreased slightly since 
<story>school started. Extrapolating the data, it would seem 
<story>impossible to fulfill my objective at this rate.

data.text:
Today, I tried a new input technique that I researched: 
"asking about uncertanties." Yet, the girl just left...
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Today, I tried a new input technique that I researched: 
<story>"asking about uncertanties." Yet, the girl just left...

data.text:
I can tell she gives it her all, but she seems to be 
misinterpreting things a little...
data.processed:
<story>I can tell she gives it her all, but she seems to be 
<story>misinterpreting things a little...

data.text:
Would parents who love their daughter really give such 
mechanical orders as 'interact with others' 
just to have her improve her social skills?
data.processed:
<story>Would parents who love their daughter really give such 
<story>mechanical orders as 'interact with others' 
<story>just to have her improve her social skills?

data.text:
I told her that her parents probably just wanted her to 
have a fun time with her friends at school. 
She just stared at me in confusion.
data.processed:
<story>I told her that her parents probably just wanted her to 
<story>have a fun time with her friends at school. 
<story>She just stared at me in confusion.

data.text:
I'm sorry, but I don't understand what you mean. 
My database does not contain any knowledge 
on this subject.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>I'm sorry, but I don't understand what you mean. 
<story>My database does not contain any knowledge 
<story>on this subject.

data.text:
I'm trying to explain that doing things with friends 
creates valuable experiences and memories, 
when suddenly...
data.processed:
<story>I'm trying to explain that doing things with friends 
<story>creates valuable experiences and memories, 
<story>when suddenly...

data.text:
Break time exceeded by 20 seconds. 
Returning to training as soon as possible.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Break time exceeded by 20 seconds. 
<story>Returning to training as soon as possible.

data.text: ...She sprints back to the racecourse.
data.processed: <story>...She sprints back to the racecourse.

data.text:
As a horse girl, she is growing very well. Yet she 
continues to be somewhat out of touch with 
the world, for better or worse.
data.processed:
<story>As a horse girl, she is growing very well. Yet she 
<story>continues to be somewhat out of touch with 
<story>the world, for better or worse.

data.text:
As she continues to run towards the horizon, I can 
only wish that one day, she will understand 
what her parents really meant.
data.processed:
<story>As she continues to run towards the horizon, I can 
<story>only wish that one day, she will understand 
<story>what her parents really meant.
